title: Arjun Reddy
description: A gifted medical student, known for his exceptional skills and intense passion for his studies, spirals into a self-destructive abyss following a devastating personal setback. When his beloved girlfriend is compelled by her family to marry another man, the young doctor struggles to cope with the heartbreak. Consumed by anger and despair, he turns to substance abuse and reckless behavior, jeopardizing his promising career and alienating those who care about him. The story delves into his turbulent journey of dealing with loss, grappling with his inner demons, and seeking redemption, ultimately portraying a raw and unfiltered portrayal of love, pain, and resilience.

title: Maharshi
description: A successful businessman, at the pinnacle of his career, begins to question the very foundations of his achievements and the choices that led him there. Feeling a void despite his material success, he embarks on a profound journey of self-discovery. This journey takes him back to his roots, reconnecting him with his past and the people who shaped him. Along the way, he confronts the stark realities of rural life, the struggles of farmers, and the essence of true happiness. Through this transformative experience, he learns invaluable lessons about life, purpose, and the importance of giving back to society. His journey ultimately leads to a renewed sense of purpose, driven by empathy, compassion, and a desire to make a meaningful impact on the lives of others.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
description: In a majestic and ancient kingdom, a young and adventurous man named Shivudu grows up in a tranquil village, unaware of his royal lineage and destiny. Drawn by an inexplicable urge to explore beyond the confines of his home, he discovers a hidden waterfall and scales its daunting heights, revealing a magnificent new world. Here, Shivudu encounters Avanthika, a fierce warrior of a rebel group striving to free their queen, Devasena, who is imprisoned by the cruel and tyrannical ruler, Bhallaladeva. Captivated by Avanthika and her mission, Shivudu joins the rebels and learns of his own connection to the royal family. As Shivudu delves deeper into his past, he uncovers the truth about his heritage: he is the long-lost son of Amarendra Baahubali, a revered and noble king, and rightful heir to the throne of Mahishmati. Determined to honor his fatherâ€™s legacy and reclaim his birthright, Shivudu, now known as Mahendra Baahubali, embarks on an epic journey filled with danger, bravery, and monumental battles. His quest is not just for power, but for justice, freedom, and the restoration of peace in his kingdom. Along the way, Shivudu must confront formidable enemies, forge unbreakable alliances, and embrace his destiny to become the hero his people need. The journey of Shivudu is one of self-discovery, resilience, and the timeless struggle between good and evil in a legendary saga that echoes through the ages.

title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
description: A man grapples with the revelation of his true identity, embarking on a journey to confront his past while navigating the complexities of family drama. As he uncovers hidden truths and long-buried secrets, he finds himself entangled in a web of emotions, loyalties, and conflicts. His quest for self-discovery leads him to challenge societal norms, reconcile with estranged family members, and ultimately redefine his place within the familial hierarchy. Throughout this tumultuous journey, he must balance his newfound knowledge with the delicate dynamics of his relationships, striving to forge a path toward acceptance and harmony in the face of overwhelming odds.

title: Bharat Ane Nenu
description: A man rises to political prominence amidst tumultuous events and familial strife, tackling corruption and striving for social justice. His journey from an unassuming individual to a powerful leader is marked by intense challenges and moral dilemmas. Along the way, he grapples with the weight of responsibility and the complexities of his relationships, seeking to honor his fatherâ€™s legacy while forging his own path. His struggle against systemic corruption becomes a personal crusade, leading him to confront powerful adversaries and rally the people towards a vision of integrity and transparency. Through his determination and resilience, he aims to transform his community and inspire a new era of accountability and progress.

title: Rangasthalam
description: In a vibrant village marred by corruption and injustice, a hearing-impaired man takes on the powerful, oppressive leaders to bring about change. As he navigates the dangerous waters of village politics, he confronts long-standing feuds and exposes hidden crimes. His quest is fueled by personal loss and a deep-seated desire for justice, compelling him to challenge the status quo. Amidst the struggle, he also finds himself entangled in a complex web of familial and romantic relationships, which test his resolve and determination. His journey is one of resilience, courage, and unwavering commitment to making his home a better place for all.

title: Nuvvu Nenu
description: A wealthy, pampered man falls in love with a simple, hardworking girl, leading to a clash of worlds and values. Despite their differences, their bond grows stronger as they navigate the challenges posed by societal norms and familial expectations. The manâ€™s journey of love and transformation is marked by a series of emotional trials and tribulations, as he learns to prioritize genuine connections over materialistic pursuits. In the process, he confronts his own flaws and prejudices, striving to become a better person. Their love story becomes a testament to the power of understanding, compromise, and the courage to defy societal conventions for the sake of true love.

title: Sye
description: A spirited college student channels his passion for sports into rallying his fellow students for a cause, leading them to victory in a high-stakes rugby tournament. Alongside the physical and emotional rigors of training and competition, he must navigate interpersonal conflicts and personal challenges. His leadership and determination inspire his teammates to rise above their limitations and work together towards a common goal. Through the journey, he learns valuable lessons about teamwork, sacrifice, and resilience. The climactic tournament becomes a test of their unity and spirit, culminating in a triumphant moment that transcends the sport itself, leaving a lasting impact on everyone involved.

title: Pokiri
description: A fearless undercover cop infiltrates the criminal underworld, blurring the lines between law and crime as he takes on a ruthless mafia boss. His mission is fraught with danger, deception, and moral ambiguities, as he navigates a world where trust is scarce and betrayal is rampant. As he delves deeper into the criminal network, he forms unexpected alliances and uncovers shocking truths about his own past. His relentless pursuit of justice pits him against formidable adversaries, leading to intense confrontations and high-stakes gambles. The journey tests his resolve, integrity, and survival instincts, ultimately forcing him to confront his own inner demons and redefine his sense of justice..

title: Aarya
description: A free-spirited young manâ€™s unrequited love for an aloof and popular girl leads him on a path of self-discovery and emotional growth. His earnest attempts to win her heart are met with challenges and misunderstandings, testing his patience and resilience. Throughout this journey, he undergoes a transformation, learning the value of sincerity, friendship, and true love. His interactions with her and others around him help him understand the complexities of relationships and the importance of being true to oneself. The story unfolds with moments of humor, heartbreak, and heartwarming realizations, culminating in a poignant resolution that underscores the essence of love and acceptance.

title: Vedam
description: The lives of five individuals from different backgrounds intersect in a hospital after a traumatic incident, leading them to reevaluate their beliefs and aspirations. Each characterâ€™s journey is marked by personal struggles, social challenges, and moments of profound realization. As they navigate their intertwined fates, they find solace and strength in each otherâ€™s stories, forging unexpected bonds. Their collective experiences highlight themes of compassion, resilience, and the power of human connection. Through their trials and triumphs, they discover new perspectives on life and the courage to pursue their true paths. The narrative weaves their stories into a tapestry of hope and redemption, leaving a lasting impact on all involved.

title: Attarintiki Daredi
description: A wealthy young man embarks on a mission to reunite his fractured family, taking on a complex web of deceit, misunderstandings, and hidden agendas. His journey involves navigating the intricate dynamics of his extended family, each member with their own set of grievances and secrets. As he endeavors to bring harmony and reconciliation, he confronts long-standing feuds and emotional wounds. His efforts are met with resistance, but his unwavering determination and heartfelt sincerity gradually break down barriers. Through humor, drama, and heartfelt moments, he unravels the knots of discord, ultimately restoring love and unity within his family.

title: Eega
description: A vengeful man is reincarnated as a housefly and uses his new form to torment the murderer who killed him in his previous life. Despite his diminutive size, he devises ingenious ways to seek revenge and protect his beloved from further harm. His transformation into a fly brings both challenges and opportunities, as he navigates the world from a new perspective. His relentless pursuit of justice and his unwavering love drive him to overcome seemingly insurmountable obstacles. The story blends elements of fantasy, suspense, and dark humor, culminating in a dramatic showdown that highlights the power of resilience and ingenuity.

title: Geetha Govindam
description: A charming young manâ€™s romantic advances towards a cautious woman lead to a series of humorous and heartfelt encounters, as he strives to win her trust and affection. Despite initial misunderstandings and setbacks, his sincerity and persistence gradually break down her defenses. Along the way, both characters undergo significant personal growth, learning valuable lessons about love, trust, and vulnerability. Their evolving relationship is marked by moments of comedy, tension, and tender realizations, as they navigate the complexities of modern romance. The narrative underscores the importance of patience, understanding, and the courage to open oneâ€™s heart to love.

title: Goodachari
description: A brilliant but troubled spy must navigate a web of international intrigue, personal vendettas, and covert operations to protect his country from a formidable threat. His mission is fraught with danger, deception, and moral dilemmas, as he confronts enemies both external and within. Alongside his professional challenges, he grapples with personal demons and unresolved issues from his past. His journey takes him through high-stakes scenarios, intense action sequences, and moments of introspection. Through his relentless pursuit of the truth and justice, he uncovers shocking secrets and forms unexpected alliances. The story highlights his resilience, ingenuity, and unwavering commitment to his mission.

title: Jersey
description: A failed cricketer decides to make a comeback in his late 30s for the sake of his son.A former cricketer grapples with his past failures and personal regrets as he attempts to make a comeback to the sport he loves. His journey is marked by emotional struggles, physical challenges, and the pressure to prove himself once again. Alongside his pursuit of redemption on the field, he navigates complex relationships with his family and loved ones. His determination and resilience inspire those around him, as he strives to overcome obstacles and reclaim his lost glory. The narrative weaves together themes of perseverance, self-belief, and the transformative power of second chances, culminating in a poignant and inspiring resolution.

title: Manam
description: A family grapples with reincarnation and the mysteries of life and death.The lives of three generations of a family intertwine in unexpected ways, revealing hidden connections and unresolved emotions. Through a series of serendipitous events and poignant moments, the characters discover the profound impact of their shared past on their present lives. The narrative explores themes of love, loss, and the enduring bonds of family, as the characters navigate their personal journeys of self-discovery and reconciliation. Their stories are woven together in a tapestry of humor, drama, and heartwarming realizations, culminating in a celebration of the enduring power of family and the timeless connections that bind them.

title: Mirchi
description: A man returns to his village to avenge his father's death and falls in love in the process.A  man returns to his hometown and becomes embroiled in a violent conflict with a powerful faction, seeking to protect his loved ones and restore peace. His journey is marked by intense action, emotional struggles, and personal sacrifices, as he confronts formidable adversaries and navigates complex relationships. Through his relentless efforts, he aims to bring justice and harmony to his community, while grappling with his own inner demons. The story blends elements of action, drama, and romance, highlighting his transformation from a reluctant hero to a determined protector. His unwavering resolve and courage inspire those around him, leading to a climactic and cathartic resolution.

title: Mr. Perfect
description: A perfectionist falls in love with a free-spirited woman, leading to a clash of personalities.A perfectionist grapples with the challenges of love, relationships, and societal expectations as he navigates his quest for the ideal life. His journey involves confronting his own rigid standards and learning to appreciate the imperfections that make life meaningful. Along the way, he encounters various characters who challenge his beliefs and help him grow emotionally and intellectually. His transformation is marked by moments of humor, introspection, and heartfelt realizations, as he learns to balance his ambitions with the complexities of human connections. The narrative underscores the importance of flexibility, empathy, and the courage to embrace lifeâ€™s uncertainties.

title: Nannaku Prematho
description: A man seeks revenge against his father's enemy while dealing with family drama.A man embarks on a quest to avenge his fatherâ€™s betrayal and death, uncovering a complex web of deceit, family secrets, and hidden agendas. His journey is marked by intense emotional struggles, strategic maneuvers, and high-stakes confrontations. As he delves deeper into his family's past, he uncovers shocking truths that challenge his perceptions and test his resolve. His relentless pursuit of justice is driven by a deep-seated desire for retribution and closure. Along the way, he forms unexpected alliances and faces formidable adversaries, leading to a climactic and emotionally charged resolution. The narrative explores themes of loyalty, revenge, and the transformative power of truth.

title: Srimanthudu
description: A wealthy businessman adopts a village to bring about positive change.A wealthy young man embarks on a mission to adopt his native village and improve its living conditions, challenging the deep-rooted societal issues and resistance from powerful factions. His journey is marked by personal growth, social activism, and moments of intense conflict. Through his sincere efforts and innovative approaches, he gradually wins the trust and support of the villagers. His mission is not just about material improvements but also about fostering a sense of community and empowerment. The narrative blends elements of drama, action, and social commentary, highlighting his transformation from a privileged individual to a dedicated and compassionate leader.

title: Temper
description: A corrupt cop undergoes a transformation after meeting a sincere police officer.A corrupt cop undergoes a dramatic transformation after a traumatic incident, deciding to seek redemption by taking down a powerful crime syndicate. His journey is fraught with moral dilemmas, intense action, and personal sacrifices, as he navigates the dangerous underworld. His transformation is driven by a deep-seated desire to atone for his past sins and protect those he cares about. Along the way, he forms unexpected alliances and confronts formidable adversaries, leading to high-stakes confrontations. The narrative explores themes of redemption, justice, and the complexities of human nature, culminating in a powerful and cathartic resolution.

title: Tholi Prema
description: Two college students fall in love, but their relationship faces several challenges.A young manâ€™s life takes a turn when he falls in love for the first time, leading to a journey of self-discovery and emotional growth. His earnest attempts to navigate the complexities of his feelings are met with challenges and misunderstandings, testing his patience and resilience. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about love, friendship, and the importance of being true to oneself. His interactions with his love interest and those around him help him understand the nuances of relationships and the courage it takes to pursue oneâ€™s heart. The narrative blends moments of humor, heartbreak, and heartfelt realizations, culminating in a poignant and hopeful resolution.

title: Yevadu
description: A man seeks revenge against those who wronged him and his loved ones.A man undergoes a dramatic physical transformation to avenge the death of his lover, infiltrating a powerful syndicate to uncover the truth. His journey is marked by intense action, emotional struggles, and high-stakes confrontations. Alongside his quest for vengeance, he grapples with his own identity and the complexities of his relationships. His relentless pursuit of justice leads him to confront formidable adversaries and uncover shocking truths about his past. The narrative blends elements of action, drama, and suspense, highlighting his transformation from a grieving lover to a determined avenger. His journey culminates in a dramatic and cathartic resolution.

title: Sarileru Neekevvaru
description: An army officer takes on a mission to protect a family from a notorious gangster.A soldier embarks on a mission to rescue a kidnapped girl, navigating a series of intense challenges and confrontations along the way. His journey is marked by personal sacrifices, high-stakes action, and moments of deep emotional resonance. Through his unwavering determination and resourcefulness, he overcomes formidable adversaries and navigates complex terrains. Alongside his mission, he grapples with his own personal demons and the impact of his past actions. The narrative blends elements of action, drama, and suspense, highlighting his transformation from a dedicated soldier to a compassionate protector. His journey culminates in a powerful and inspiring resolution.

title: Gaddalakonda Ganesh
description: A criminal mastermind faces off against a police officer determined to catch him.A small-time gangsterâ€™s life takes an unexpected turn when he becomes embroiled in a series of violent and dramatic events, challenging his loyalties and survival instincts. His journey is marked by intense action, personal struggles, and moments of dark humor, as he navigates the dangerous underworld. Along the way, he forms unexpected alliances and confronts formidable adversaries, leading to high-stakes confrontations. Through his relentless pursuit of power and survival, he grapples with his own identity and the complexities of his relationships. The narrative explores themes of ambition, loyalty, and the moral ambiguities of life in the criminal world.

title: Dear Comrade
description: A passionate young man fights for social justice while navigating love and relationships.A passionate student leader fights against societal injustices and personal demons, seeking to bring about meaningful change while navigating the complexities of his relationships. His journey is marked by intense emotional struggles, high-stakes confrontations, and moments of deep introspection. Through his relentless activism and unwavering determination, he inspires those around him to stand up for their beliefs and fight for justice. Alongside his political battles, he grapples with his own vulnerabilities and the impact of his actions on his loved ones. The narrative blends elements of drama, romance, and social commentary, highlighting his transformation from a fiery rebel to a compassionate leader.

title: Jalsa
description: A young man falls in love with a woman but faces opposition from her family.A carefree young manâ€™s life changes when he is tasked with protecting a young woman from a dangerous faction, leading to a series of humorous and dramatic events. His journey is marked by intense action, personal growth, and moments of deep emotional resonance. Alongside his mission, he navigates the complexities of his own relationships and grapples with his past mistakes. His interactions with the young woman and those around him help him understand the value of responsibility and selflessness. The narrative blends elements of comedy, drama, and action, highlighting his transformation from a carefree individual to a dedicated protector.

title: Happy Days
description: A group of college students navigate friendship, love, and life.A group of college friends navigates the ups and downs of campus life, forging deep bonds and learning valuable lessons along the way. Their journey is marked by moments of humor, drama, and emotional growth, as they navigate the challenges of academics, relationships, and personal aspirations. Through their shared experiences, they discover the importance of friendship, loyalty, and the courage to pursue their dreams. The narrative weaves together their individual stories into a tapestry of camaraderie and self-discovery, highlighting the transformative power of their college years. Their collective journey culminates in a celebration of youth, friendship, and the promise of the future.

title: Krishna Gaadi Veera Prema Gaadha
description: A cowardly man embarks on an adventure to save the woman he loves.A timid young manâ€™s quest for love leads him on a series of humorous and dramatic adventures, as he navigates the challenges of winning the heart of his childhood crush. His journey is marked by personal growth, moments of deep emotional resonance, and the complexities of modern romance. Along the way, he grapples with his own insecurities and learns the value of sincerity and perseverance. His interactions with his love interest and those around him help him understand the nuances of relationships and the courage it takes to pursue oneâ€™s heart. The narrative blends elements of comedy, drama, and romance, culminating in a poignant and hopeful resolution.

title: Fidaa
description: An NRI falls in love with a woman from a traditional family and faces opposition from her father.A headstrong young womanâ€™s quest for independence and self-discovery leads her to a tumultuous relationship with a man from a different background. Their journey is marked by intense emotional struggles, cultural clashes, and moments of deep personal growth. Through their interactions, they learn to navigate the complexities of their relationship and the societal expectations that challenge their bond. Along the way, they discover the importance of understanding, compromise, and the courage to follow their hearts. The narrative blends elements of drama, romance, and social commentary, highlighting their transformation from individuals seeking their own paths to a couple finding common ground.

title: Majili
description: A man struggles to move on from his past while finding love and redemption.A troubled coupleâ€™s journey towards reconciliation and healing is marked by intense emotional struggles, personal growth, and moments of profound realization. Their relationship, strained by past mistakes and unfulfilled dreams, undergoes a series of challenges and transformations. Through their interactions, they learn to confront their own vulnerabilities and rediscover the love that brought them together. Alongside their personal journey, they navigate the complexities of their family dynamics and societal expectations. The narrative blends elements of drama, romance, and introspection, highlighting their transformation from a couple on the brink of separation to one finding renewed hope and commitment.

title: Ghazi Attack
description: The crew of a submarine battles against all odds to protect their country.A naval officer leads a daring underwater mission to thwart a dangerous enemy threat, navigating intense challenges and high-stakes confrontations along the way. His journey is marked by personal sacrifices, moments of deep emotional resonance, and the pressure of leadership in a life-or-death situation. Through his unwavering determination and strategic acumen, he inspires his crew to rise above their fears and work together towards a common goal. The narrative blends elements of action, suspense, and drama, highlighting his transformation from a dedicated officer to a heroic leader. His journey culminates in a powerful and inspiring resolution, showcasing the resilience and bravery of those who serve.
